outline.title: Premium Guitar Tone is Inaccessible to Most Players
outline.summary: Present the problem: Brazilian rosewood guitars cost $5,000-$50,000+, premium tonewoods are rare due to CITES restrictions, 95% of guitarists play instruments under $1,000
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: AI-Powered Tonewood Transformation
outline.summary: Introduce Starwood GuitarFX as the solution: neural network models acoustic properties of premium tonewoods, transforms any guitar's fundamental tonal character in real-time
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: DDSP-Powered Neural Tonewood Modeling
outline.summary: Explain the technology flow: pickup captures signal, neural network analyzes and transforms, DDSP synthesis applies tonewood properties, output with premium character
outline.image_plan: Use a suitable image if needed

outline.title: Built on Proven AI Audio Technology
outline.summary: Detail the technical foundation: RAVE-DDSP-Transformer architecture, Tonewood Embedding Network, sub-10ms latency, peer-reviewed research basis

outline.title: Premium Tonewood Presets at Your Fingertips
outline.summary: Showcase the tonewood library: Brazilian Rosewood, Cocobolo, Honduran Mahogany, Koa, and custom blend capabilities

outline.title: Three Products, One Revolutionary Technology

outline.title: The Only Product That Transforms Guitar Character
